about.title: About Me
description: I am a Computer Engineer with 4 years of experience in Android development, skilled in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, MVVM, GraphQL, and dependency injection (Hilt).

Currently working at HCLTech as a third-party Android Developer for SAP, contributing to the design, implementation, and optimization of complex Android features and user interfaces. Previously worked at Nelogica, developing and maintaining high-performance trading applications.
Strong academic foundation from Federal University of Rio Grande (FURG), with hands-on experience in Python, Unity (Ray Tracing), and Web Development.
Motivated by innovation and technical challenges, I thrive in collaborative environments where quality, scalability, and performance are top priorities.
